title: Persona 5 Strikers Download
description:
Join the Phantom Thieves and strike back against the corruption overtaking cities across Japan. A summer vacation with close friends takes a sudden turn as a distorted reality emerges; reveal the truth and redeem the hearts of those imprisoned at the center of the crisis While the main character of the series and his friends are preparing for the celebrations and travel, strange things begin to happen in Tokyo , in one way or another connected with a mysterious girl named Sofia.
Naturally, this attracted the attention of “ghost thieves “, and now you have to go on a trip to Japan and try to get to the bottom of the truth and find out what is happening. The situation is very confusing and will lead you through a whole series of intrigues, strange situations and mysterious events As for the gameplay, it is the same in the new game as it was in the previous full-fledged part of the series. You will also explore locations, look for characters involved in the case, look for clues and clues, perform various tasks related to the events that are taking place, and of course, fight waves of enemies, shadows, and more.

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB)
